thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 01 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-ZTE returns to net profit in 2017, Sets Pricing For Its A-Share Private Placement

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-ZTE returns to net profit in 2017, Sets Pricing For Its A-Share Private Placement
text:
Feb 1 (Reuters) - ZTE Corp:
* SAYS IT RETURNS TO NET PROFIT IN PRELIM 2017 AT 4.55 BILLION YUAN ($722.68 million) FROM NET LOSS OF 2.36 BILLION YUAN YEAR AGO
* SAYS ITS SHARE ISSUE PRICE WILL BE NO LOWER THAN 30 YUAN PER SHARE IN ITS PLANNED A-SHARE PRIVATE PLACEMENT PROPOSAL Source text in Chinese: bit.ly/2nvTtyQ ; bit.ly/2DSfRxs Further company coverage: ($1 = 6.2960 Chinese yuan renminbi) (Reporting by Hong Kong newsroom)
